"},{"text":"Ink Spitting Squid","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Swimming underwater near a squid will cause it to ink the player. When affected by squid ink, blindness and nausea effects occur."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.ink_spitting_squid.1"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"When glow squids ink, they have the opposite effect from squids. Players inked with glow ink are affected by night vision and glowing."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.ink_spitting_squid.2"}]}]
